naslov: New assassins creed is coming out soon!
opis: Developers said to be one of the best combat games yet
opiscic: Still not too much informations about the new game, but developers said it will be revolutionary. It has it all : Graphics, Combat, Missions, fun!

opis: For the third time not really living up to its expectations
opiscic: We expected much more. Why do they even bother putting so much pressure on themselves? Watch dogs 3 had weak storyline, no punch, and a disasterous ending!

opis: We already lost the count of how many games they have made. Is it like 30?
opiscic: Every year same thing. Huge hype for the game, and in the end : Same story. We start with jumping out of a heli, just to have some solo missions which are really fun, but then again the same co-op missions.
